div.font: PARENTS, please take a moment to fill out this
to determine how you will receive educational materials. Thank you!

font.b: SCHOOL WILL BE CLOSED FOR THE
ALL ACTIVITIES AND SPORTS ARE SUSPENDED THROUGH MAY 31.

b.font: WILL REMAIN CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.

div.span: will receive educational packets by mail on, or before, April 4th and April 18th.

div.div: Please encourage your children to do these activities.
Please email teresa.thompson@o-mschools.org if you wish to check out
a computer for your child to use at home. Pick up of computers will be on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays, beginning Wednesday, April 8.

div.span: Parents will need to stop at the east doors of the school and Mrs. Thompson will
give you your child's laptop. You must email Teresa Thompson FIRST.

font.b: For ALL kids ages 0-18 in the Orient and Macksburg communities. If you are interested in participating, simply click on the link below, fill in the blanks, hit SUBMIT. There is a deadline to sign up. Please take this opportunity if you are in need of meal help.
Please see Academic Activities to do at home on the left.

b.font: Please watch the O-M website at www.o-mschools.org for updates and further developments.

font.font: help prevent the spread of this, and other viruses, by taking the following measures:

p.span: - Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
- Use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer if soap and water are not available.
- Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth, with unwashed hands.
- Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
- Try to avoid being in groups of people and try to maintain a distance of several feet.
- Cover your mouth with your upper arm or a tissue, when sneezing or coughing.
- Clean and disinfect frequently touched surfaces and objects.
If you have questions or need assistance, please contact Norene Bunt at (712) 229-4443. Please take steps to keep yourselves healthy and safe.

a.b: Be sure to check out our Job

font.span: The Orient-Macksburg Community School District will:

br.span: *Differentiate instruction to better meet Student needs
*Incorporate 21st Century skills to develop productive citizens (technology)

font.u: Continuous Notice of Nondiscrimination Policy Statement:

font.span: It is the policy of the Orient-Macksburg Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district’s Equity Coordinator: Norene Bunt, Superintendent, 201 School Street, Orient, Iowa 50858,
